name: Amnaat Luukjan
description: '''Amnaat Luukjan''' ({{langx|th|อำนาจ ลูกจันทร์}}; March 20, 1949 – July 14, 2017 in [[Bangkok]]) or better known as '''Pao Carabao''' (เป้า คาราบาว), nickname Pao (เป้า), was a Thai [[musician]]. He was known as [[drummer]] of [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]], a famous [[Thai rock]] and [[Phleng phuea chiwit]] (Thai [[protest song]]) band.
